text: Mr. Wonderful is the second studio album by British blues band Fleetwood Mac. It was released on 23 August, 1968 through Blue Horizon. It is a full throttle blues album was broadly similar to their debut studio album. It went to number 8 in Norway and number 10 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1968 albums Category:Fleetwood Mac albums
title: Mr. Wonderful (Fleetwood Mac album)
